Description:
DOUBLE BRICK HOME CLOSE TO BEACH !!
This is a great opportunity to enjoy a beach side lifestyle within walking distance to a safe sandy swimming beach or potential for income either from permanent rental/holiday investment.
The home itself offers 3 large bedrooms , ceiling fans, spacious living area with woodheater, modern kitchen with electric cooktop and dishwasher, good size family bathroom, large entrance and tiled floors throughout for easy maintenance.
Outdoor boasts plenty of space for cars with single and double garage with
concreted floors, back verandah with rural outlook, sunblinds, outside
shower great to clean off from after the beach, concreted driveway and the backyard is fenced.
Walk to playground, bbq area and shop. Enjoy strolling the beach and or
just taking in the beautiful sunsets in this peaceful location. Phillip
Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins and CBD easy commute with dual lane highway.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
VENDOR SAYS SELL!!!
Located in quiet street only minutes walk to safe sandy swimming beach is this split-level home consisting of -
* downstairs brick exterior
* 3 bedrooms with wall to wall carpet, robes, ceiling fans
* open plan living/kitchen and meals area
* 2 airconditioners & 2 ceiling fans
* exposed beams
* slate flooring in kitchen
* bathroom and laundry combined
Upstairs hardiplank exterior
* large living room/teenagers retreat, plus bedroom
* 3 car carport
* boat/caravan space enclosed
* 2 concrete driveways
* single garage, concrete floor and powered
* fenced off backyard.
Minutes to shop, school and kindergarten, cafes and bus service. Major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins and Phillip Island. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
As New Residence *5.5 Energy Rating*
Well presented property in as new condition, this attached residence features;
- 3 good sized double bedrooms in total
- Spacious master bedroom with large walk in robe, ensuite bathroom, TV & phone point, large window and double blinds
- 2 additional good sized double bedrooms with built in robes, large windows and blinds
- Generous family bathroom with bath, separate shower, vanity and basin
- Large living room with excellent natural light, large windows, double blinds, glass sliding door onto entertaining deck area
- Good sized dining area and Kitchen area with walk in pantry, good quality appliances including dishwasher and generous storage
- Separate front sitting room retreat area with built in cupboard , TV point and TV alcove
- Walk in laundry with trough, large built in cupboard and ample space for washer with dryer over
- Generous amount of built in cupboards throughout the house for storage
- Single carport, also with space for 2 additional cars in driveway
- 5 star high quality split system heating and cooling system
- Large decking area, fully fenced, low maintenance private backyard with landscaping, storage shed, clothes line plus water tank and pump.
- Landscaped front garden with lawn, low maintenance planting and concrete driveway Certified 5 star energy rated home
- 15 minute walk to sandy swimming beach and local convenience store at coronet bay foreshore as well as public transport links to Philip Island, Wonthaggi, Inverloch, Cranbourne, Dandenong and Melbourne
An excellent residence for the owner occupier or investor, inspection will impress.

Address: 49 Bass Horizon Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
AFFORDABLE RENTAL INVESTMENT !!!
This is your opportunity to secure a property at this price which is tenanted out for $240 per week. Charming 2 bedroom home ideal for holiday/ rental property with open plan living, exposed beams, floating floor, split-system air-conditioner, cosy kitchen with electric cooking, 2 bedrooms with BIRs and wwc, family bathroom and good size laundry.
Easy access to front verandah with ramp ideal for wheelchair access, plenty of space for doing carport or garage, established gardens and the property is fully fenced. Walking distance to a safe sandy swimming beach and shop.
There are not many properties left at this price so inspection is a must.
Approximately 7 mins to local primary school, kindergarten, shops, doctor and ambulance depot. Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins.

Description:
STYLISH BEACHSIDE HOUSE
Location is the major point to consider when buying a property and you won't find better than this. Just a very short walk and you're at the water’s edge and the stunning reserve, General Store, and walking tracks.
This very well-appointed home offers 4 bedrooms 2 upstairs and 2 down stairs with BIR’s, spacious open plan living upstairs and down stairs. Two kitchens one upstairs and one down stairs.
Two Bathrooms down stairs bathroom has a spa bath. Wood fire upstairs and down stairs, air - con, ceiling fans. Balcony upstairs. A perfect low maintenance backyard with entertaining deck at the rear of the property, garden sheds.
Contact Daniel or Tamara

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL HOME WITH GRAND VIEWS
Perfectly positioned to enjoy the stunning natural beauty for which Coronet Bay & Bass Coast is renowned for, this prime location offers magnificent views, wineries and the rugged Bass Strait coastline that distinguishes this idyllic part of the world, the potential is abundantly clear.
The home features two kitchens one upstairs and one down stairs - 4 good sized bedrooms, with built in robes. Open plan living and dining. 2 bathroom's one upstairs and one down stairs, and separate toilet's.
This property is a must see if you are looking for that perfect rural coastal life style.
Please call Tamara or Daniel to arrange your private inspection

Description:
PERFECT AND PRIVATE FAMILY BEACH HOME
If you are looking for an easy to maintain 4 bedroom home in a great location then look no further. Set on approx - 811sqm block and positioned close to the beach in fact 600 meters only from the Beach and General Store strip, this home has a very private and tranquil feel. The large garage has room for the car & boat. With a fully fenced yard, with a wonderful garden and deck to sit and enjoy beach side living. There is a great veggie garden to pick everything fresh to eat and water tank these are all part of the features this home has to offer. There is a family lounge a formal lounge with wood heater, split system, Kitchen is open plan with dining area.
All 4 bedrooms come with built-ins, central bathroom, master with ensuite, walk in robe.
If you are looking for more than just a holiday house then this property is a must see.
If you are unable to attend a scheduled open please call for a private viewing.

Description:
IMMACULATE BEACH HOME
There is nothing to do but enjoy your new home, only 500m to a quiet safe and sandy swimming beach at Coronet Bay where fishing, swimming, walking tracks, wineries, Phillip Island attractions are all close by. The home has a light and bright feel with modern touches and has been tastefully renovated throughout with fresh paint, new carpets and polished floors. The open plan living area is spacious with beautifully polished timber floors, a reverse cycle split system air conditioner, wood heater and ceiling fan. The open plan kitchen with dishwasher has a modern feel and open to the living area, perfect for all the family. There are three generous bedrooms, master bedroom with a kitchenette and full ensuite with spa bath and large shower. You can relax on the rear deck which overlooks the back yard and there is a garage with remote roller door and a long driveway for plenty of parking. A perfect first home, holiday home or investment with all the work done for you.

INSPIRING BAY VIEWS ACROSS WESTERNPORT BAY!
When looking for an ideal beach house, what do we need - BAY VIEWS, BEACH AND BIG BLOCK! Look no further - Situated in a sought after location and only approx.. 100 metres to a safe sandy swimming beach is this 2 storey beach home featuring:
Downstairs -
- 2 bedrooms.
- Living area.
- Kitchenette.
- Bathroom/ laundry combined.
- Timber floors.
- Air conditioner.
- Wide entrance to backyard.
- Timber staircase to:
Upstairs -
- Bright and spacious open plan living.
- Kitchen and meals area.
- Sliding door from living to large balcony with fantastic views to San Remo and French Island.
- Meals area has sliding door to balcony offering rural views.
- Split system air conditioner.

Coronet Bay is a safe sandy swimming beach, great for families. Phillip Island and major shopping centre approximately 20 mins and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Address: 92 Champ Elysees Esplanade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
Live by the seaside in this as new 3 bedroom + study home!!
This 2 story home is just 5 years old and built to capture the sea views towards Phillip Island. An easy 200m stroll to the sandy beach, water edge is dog friendly area. Upstairs the home has open plan kitchen/meals/living room with direct access to the 3 x 6m covered balcony. This is a fantastic place to have a BBQ, entertain and gaze out to sea!! Kitchen has electric cooking, dishwasher and breakfast bar. Lovely bamboo flooring and split system make for easy living! Second living room with split system. East facing main bedroom with WIR, ensuite and ceiling fan. 2 guest bedrooms with BIRs and bathroom with bath and shower plus a separate toilet. The study is a handy addition plus house has ducted vacuum.
Town water plus 2 rain water tanks. Work shed 3 x 6m with power and concrete floor. Double garage with 2 auto roller doors.
A wonderful residence in which to enjoy life in!!

Description:
Ideal holiday home on double block
This 3 bedroom house on an elevated double block of 1,069 square meters would be ideal for your holiday getaway. With tons of space to relax and enjoy and attractive water views, it is perfect right now with great potential for future development (STCA) of both house and land.
Polished hardwood floors feature upstairs in the 3 bedrooms (main with BIR’s), family bathroom and toilet, kitchen and living rooms. Views can be enjoyed from both the kitchen and better from the living room leading onto the balcony.
Downstairs is a large rumpus room, laundry and 2nd toilet. The large lot features 2 garages, a garden shed and lots of space, for playing; parking; building for the future (STCA) or just plain fun.

Address: 57 CUTTY SARK ROAD Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
IDEAL LOCATION CORONET BAY!
What a location! With the beach literally just 400 meters down the road.
If you have been looking for a home that offers beach style living or just need a weekender or somewhere to retreat to from the hustle & bustle of everyday life you will not find better than this timeless beauty. In one of Coronet Bay’s most sought after location, 400 meters walking distance to the beach and the General Store and walking tracks. This home is bright & comfortable, neat & tidy and offers open plan living space & 2/3 bedrooms. Kitchen and meals area with air conditioner, timber floors, exposed beams, cosy kitchen with stainless steel stove. There is a great deck out the front to enjoy the beautiful summer days and nights, from the back yard you can enjoy rural views from your garden.
There is a large single lock up garage, double carport, garden shed.
Phillip Island and Major Shopping Centre is approx... 25 mins and CBD approx... 1hr 15 mins.
Inspections 7 Days a week.

Description:
CHARMING LIFESTYLE FAMILY HOME WITH AMAZING BAY & SUNSET VIEWS
You’ll find yourself indulged by the remarkable bay, views of French Island from the back terrace, where the property also overlook’s and has access to the beautiful Coronet Bay reserve. This solid, well-built home offers three great sized bedrooms with new carpet and BIR upstairs, updated bathroom, open plane living upstairs, with a good size kitchen dish washer, gas cooking and electric oven, and air conditioning to keep you cool on those summer days. Down stairs very large functional living quarters or retreat with option for a fourth bedroom. The second bathroom is down stairs in conjunction with the laundry. Lock-up car garage and carport for vehicles. Large low maintenance garden.
This property is a must see – Within 500 meters to the stunning Coronet Bay Swimming Beach and General Store.
Inspections 7 days a week

Description:
IDEAL FIRST HOME BUYERS OR RENTAL INVESTMENT
Opportunity to buy a 3 bedroom brick home situated within walking distance to a safe sandy swimming beach at an affordable price. Featuring a cosy living area with woodheater, open plan kitchen and meals area. Undercover side verandah, sunblinds, garage, carport and fenced off backyard. This is a low maintenance property and is currently tenanted on a month to month basis at $240 per week. The front yard is ideal for a keen gardener to put their own stamp which would make this property more appealing. Only minutes to local primary school, kindergarten, 24 hour boat ramp, approx.. 25 mins to major shopping centre and Phillip Island.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
Silversea Residence with Beautiful Views
This property features beautiful bay views to Phillip Island / Westernport Bay with a flexible
living space, including an established B&B / holiday rental.
Approx. 1 hour from Melbourne and only
10 minutes to Phillip Island in a quiet rural setting, this location will suit you!
Featurers include:
- Timber wall panelling
- Exposed rough sawn oregon beams and
rafters
- Mudbrick/cedar weatherboard
- Clerestory windows
- Upstairs studio
- Unlimited balcony views
Undercover parking for 5 cars with concrete driveway and parking areas.
The backyard has a large double garage/workshop and entertaining area.
There is also a mature olive tree, lemon tree and planter boxes for vegetables and herbs.
The property has been well maintainted by the original owners and is pet friendly with fencing all round.
There is also solar power/ solar hot water, with a Xantrax power inverter which can be set to off grid operation if required.

Address: 3 RUE DE LA PAI Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
EXQUISITE BEACH HOUSE ON – Rue De La Pai
The quality renovation of this home provides one with all the contemporary conveniences and comforts, while retaining the original heritage character and charms.
With a modern open plan design the functional new kitchen with Tasmanian Oak polished floorboards opens out to the living and dining spaces. With large windows, this allows an abundance of natural light and breezes into the home.
The beautifully maintained house has three large bedrooms with BIRs, all freshly painted, with new carpet & new curtains throughout. The home offers two bathrooms - both with new tiling. The master bedroom ensuite is totally new.
This fully renovated home offers large laundry, ducted vacuum system, wood fire, ample storage drawers & cupboards, and double robes in bedrooms.
To complete the idyllic picture, there is a new large merbau deck for all your entertaining needs that overlook the lush surrounds, with B.B.Q. area, easy to maintain garden, walking distance to the Coronet bay swimming beach. ( only 150 metres from the home )
This property has the best of everything to offer, from : walking tracks, local wineries, swimming beach, & close proximity to General Store, and Philip Island.
Inspection is a must. If you are unable to attend a scheduled " Open for inspection ",
Please call to arrange a private viewing.

Description:
LUXURY BEACH - SIDE LIVING
Designed with features rarely offered, this fully air-conditioned retreat or home offers two bedrooms upstairs with bay views, open living area and kitchen that seamlessly connects through to a butlers serving window where there is an alfresco dining pavilion.
The sophisticated elegance of this boutique home is a must see and is within strolling distance from the beach. There is also a self contained bungalow on the property that would make a wonderful guest retreat for all your visitors and has its own bathroom and toilet.
This property ticks all the boxes for beach style living the home comes fully complete with plantation shutters throughout.
The garden is fantastic, and has well designed vegie garden boxes, also has a carport, a garden shed. This boutique home is ideal for anyone wanting the sea change life style or a holiday destination.
Agent available 7 days a week.

Description:
BEACH HOUSE IN PERFECT POSITION
If you want to feel like you're always on holidays at a relaxed beach house, this is the place for you!
Situated only 500 meters from the Beach and General Store strip, this beach house is ready to move into! With an approximately 580sqm block, the opportunities are endless.
The open plan style gives lots of light throughout and comprises of 2 bedrooms, bathroom/laundry, kitchen/dining and lounge, with a gas pot belly style heater for those chilly evenings.
A patio at the front and sunroom at the back means there's plenty of space to enjoy those sunny afternoons. The property offers a carport and large garage, with the added bonus of solar panels and a completely fenced-in yard.
With this location and price, this is a must see property.
Inspection is a must. If you are unable to attend a scheduled "Open for Inspection ", please call to arrange a private viewing.
